description:
An Edge video... done in....Lavender!?
Did some different stuff to try and keep things interesting. It is dang hard to come up with fetish type things each time...and stick within the model's narrow limits.
I actually think this one is pretty cool. Hope you like it.
Isaiah was WAY aroused. The most turned on I have ever seen a guy. His dick was dripping in the jockstrap I made him wear. (I know, pretty feminine undies, but it went with the theme). He stayed hard from start to finish.
Ransom actually showed up in lavender boxer briefs, so this video was meant to be color themed.
There is a spoiler at the end, so be on alert. Ransom nor Isaiah gauged just how turned on he was!
Without giving too much away (I kept the previews and camcaps deliberately neutral), the first part of the video was designed because Isaiah had incredibly narrows limits.
No cock in mouth, nothing in his butt, no kissing....you name it, it wasn't gonna happen.
Turns out we didn't have to rely on the lavender trick to break his boundaries. He pushed most all of them.
After the shoot, Isaiah said, "Sign me up for full-on work, that was hot!"
Hope you enjoy it as much as these boys had doing it!
title: Isaiah & Ransom - Edge
